abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of: (a)
            construction, furnishing and equipping of: (i) the
            improvement and expansion of the existing technical
            institute; (ii) the new Lesotho Institute for Business and
            Administration; (iii) the headquarters of the new Lesotho
            National Extension College; (iv) facilities for a practical
            studies program in six secondary schools; (b) technical
            assistance and fellowships for staff development; (c)
            professional services and operational support for the
            Project Unit.
